pullrequest.title: Add cmake code to get hg hash

content.raw: I didn't realize that it would include the branch name (apparently only when it's not default), but that sounds useful to me.  If somebody runs experiments from some random branch, that would be good to know.  I'm not expecting to automatically parse the contents of that string, so I think that letting it contain extra information is OK.
content.html: I didn't realize that it would include the branch name (apparently only when it's not default), but that sounds useful to me. If somebody runs experiments from some random branch, that would be good to know. I'm not expecting to automatically parse the contents of that string, so I think that letting it contain extra information is OK.
